title: Issuing Downloading League Onto New Computer
body: Recently got a new computer with slightly better specs than my last one but am having issues downloading league onto it, I usually make it to almost the last part of the download then it gives me an error warning saying that something else is being installed and that it must be completed before league will finish. I have tried everything I can think of to fix it yet can't seem to get past this screen... any help is much appreciated

replies.body: If you're making it all the way near the end, then the snag could be a network issue failing to backtrack and pick up missed updates.  Your best bet for this one is to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to to troubleshoot and tune up your connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
